text:
Jerrier A. "Jerry" Haddad (July 17, 1922 – March 31, 2017) was an American computer engineer. He was a fellow of both the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers and the American Association for the Advancement of Science, and was a member of the National Academy of Engineering. He was born in New York City.
Haddad died on March 31, 2017, aged 94.

annotations.surface_form: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
American Association for the Advancement of Science
